0P0000VA9Q.TO.long_name: Ninepoint Silver Equities Class Series A
0P0000VA9Q.TO.summary: The investment objective of the Fund is to seek to achieve long-term capital growth. The Fund invests primarily in equity securities of companies that are directly or indirectly involved in the exploration, mining, production or distribution of silver. The Fund can also invest in silver and silver certificates.
0P0000VA9Q.TO.manager_bio: Eric Sprott has 40 years of experience in the investment industry. After completing his undergraduate degree at Carleton University and earning his designation as a Chartered Accountant, Eric entered the investment industry as a research analyst at Merrill Lynch. In 1981, he founded Sprott Securities Inc. (SSI), which has become one of Canada's largest independently owned institutional brokerage firms. At SSI, Eric was Chief Executive Officer and Chief Investment Officer and directed the investment strategy of the firm.
